name: IP_EDU_HANDOUT_TRACK_HX
description: Stores a history of all educaation patient materials marked as given or viewed by the patient.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the education record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: HANDOUT_LINK_HX
columns.description: Stores the handout link history for all patient handouts received by the patient.

columns.name: HANDOUT_NAME_HX
columns.description: The handout name history for all patient handouts received.

columns.name: GIVEN_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user ID for all handouts that have been directly marked as given to the patient.

columns.name: GIVEN_HX_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: VIEWED_HX_MYPT_ID
columns.description: Stores the history of all MyChart accounts that viewed the patient material.

columns.name: RECEVD_HX_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant history for any patient material that was received by the patient.

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_ID
columns.description: The ETX ID history for all clinical references that have been viewed by the patient.

columns.name: SMARTTEXT_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: FDI_HX_CLIENT_IDENT
columns.description: Stores the history of FDI Client IDs for all FDI handouts received by the patient

columns.name: DELETED_YN
columns.description: Whether this handout has been marked as given or if the given status has been deleted.
